s** layout definition
.
\documentclass{article}

\setlength{\textwidth}{10cm}
\setlength{\oddsidemargin}{1cm}
\setlength{\marginparwidth}{2.4cm}
\setlength{\marginparsep}{4.5mm}

\begin{document}
\marginpar{And here is a piece on the right.}
This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text.
This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text.
This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text.
\end{document}
.

This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text.
This is just some simple text. This is just some simple text.
\end{document}
